column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. I THINK THATS THE LAST OF THEM. COUNTER ATTACK REPELLED. OVER.
THIS IS HELO. WE ARE OUT OF AMMO. RETURNING TO BASE FOR REARMING. OVER.
HELO REPORTING. REARMED AND RETURNING TO THE BATTLE. OVER.
THIS IS HELO 2. OUT OF AMMO, GOING TO PICK UP SOME MORE. OVER.
HELO 2 TO ALPHA. DONE REARMING. HEADING BACK TO YOU GUYS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. EXCELLENT WORK MEN. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
